name: Bug Fables - Vi Simulator
description:
Vi's asked for a reward for the LAST TIME!

You can now BULLY VI in 3D! With 4 ENDINGS AND VARIABLE KICK TORQUE!

Optional music, so you can blast your own bully theme while watching her fly!

Make sure to share Vi's Journey with the Bug Fables twitter!

(Also, you can press ESC to reset the level!)

Free stuff used:

https://www.cgtrader.com/items/3596551/download-page
